attributes.action: Vote on proposed restrictions due to pathogens
attributes.additional_details: The current situation where restrictions are arbitrarily imposed is undemocratic and controlled by unelected scientists.
attributes.background: Our elected members must be given the opportunity to debate and vote on any further restrictions regarding mask wearing or isolating

rejection.details:
MPs debated and agreed new regulations relating to wearing of face masks and self-isolation in England last Tuesday: https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2021-11-30/debates/BDFDB48B-B6FF-4DC0-97A0-100DF3A42151/PublicHealth

Other changes to legal restrictions relating to Covid-19 would also need to be agreed by MPs.
